Czech artist living on the border of Northern Moravia and South-Eastern Silesia.

Currently: Art Director at Perun Creative
Formerly: freelance illustrator/concept artist
Also: long time modder

Tabletop and traditional projects:
The One Ring (1st and 2nd editions), Hobbit Tales, Runequest/Glorantha, 13th Age, Tales of Tamriel, Oathmark, Hillfolk

Videogames: King of Dragon Pass, Six Ages: Ride Like the Wind, Six Ages: Lights Going Out, Kromlech (UE5)
